PPLoc: Office of the Manager, HR Administration
activities: Sermatech acquires, processes and maintains employment related personal data about our employees in order to exercise our responsibilities under applicable employment laws and for general human resources administration.
personaldata: human resources data, on-line and manual
privacyprograms: Sermatech is not a member of any privacy program relative to safe harbor.
recoursemech: Sermatech is committed to cooperating with the EU data protection authorities in the investigation and resolution of complaints brought under Safe Harbor in order to satisfy Safe Harbor Enforcement Principles, specifically (a) and (c).
